name: File hosts links with Favicons
description:
Provide favicons for file hosts links

You can test it here: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/933/favicons/testlinks.html

Working with:
2shared.com, 4shared.com, badongo.com, bitshare.com, box.net, depositfiles.com, duckload.com, easy-share.com, enterupload.com, extabit.com, filefactory.com, fileserve.com, filesonic.com, freakshare.com, hotfile.com, hulkshare.com, load.to, magaupload.com, mediafire.com, megashare.com, midupload.com, mirrorcreator.com, multiupload.com, oron.com, rapidshare.com, sendspace.com, sharebase.to, sharecash.org, turbobit.net, uploaded.to, uploading.com, x7.to, ziddu.com, zippyshare.com, zshare.net

ver 1.1.2 --- 2011-02-06
* fixed megaupload.com
ver 1.1.1 --- 2011-01-14
! change name
+ added rule for easy-share.com
ver 1.1 --- 2011-01-14
- removed all !important attributes, now style won't interfere with link checkers
+ added more rules for megaupload.com and megashare.com
ver 1.0 --- 2011-01-13
+ Initial release
